The Defiled Amalgamation is a pre-Hardmode boss that resides in the [link Defiled Wastelands]. It can be summoned when the player is on the surface of the world after destroying 3 [link Defiled Fissures] or when the player uses
a [link Nerve Impulse Manipulator] anywhere in the Wastelands. It resembles a bird-like, faintly-humanoid appearance while having two large fang-like
appendages on both of its sides. These appendages reduce incoming damage by 65% when attacked from them (80% in Expert, and 100% in Master).

The Defiled Amalgamation has multiple behaviors during its encounter. It dashes at the player, summons spikes, and can regenerate health. These
behaviors can be explained in greater detail below.

The Defiled Amalgamation is the only source of Undead Chunks and is additionally a method to obtaining usable amounts of [link Lost Ore]. Furthermore, defeating the Amalgamation allows the Tavernkeep to spawn.

Behavior

Approach

When the Amalgamation approaches the player, it will use its appendages to protect itself as it slowly descends to the ground whilst following the
player's horizontal position. When close enough, it will drop and prepare to attack the player.

Dash Attack

The Amalgamation will attempt to hit the player with a fast dash. It will charge at the player with its appendages swaying to its movement.

Uplift Attack

The Defiled Amalgamation will charge an attack where it balls up then proceeds to lift its appendages up, summoning Defiled spikes that expand
upward below the player. It will only perform this attack when the player is near solid ground.

Knockout Attack

The Amalgamation's final attack is a triple-dash attack strike, but when it finishes the strike it will rest in place unable to move for 9 seconds
(6 seconds in Expert, and 3 seconds in Master).

Special

The Amalgamation additionally has an active regeneration consistent with other Defiled [link Enemies] with a few key differences: the Defiled Amalgamation cannot regenerate above 80% health AND its regeneration rate is flat. Flat
regeneration basically means that its regeneration rate does not accelerate from recieved damage.

Difficulty Changes

Expert

- In Expert, the Defiled Amalgamation will have 60% more health raising it up from 2400 to 3840.
- The Amalgamation will attack more frequently as its health drops.
- The Amalgamation's attacks have a 50% chance of inflicting '[link Rasterized]' which will last up to 5 seconds, and still allow the player to attack.
- The appendages on the Amalgamation will reduce incoming damage by 80%.
- The Defiled Amalgamation will only rejuvenate for 6 seconds after performing a Knockout attack instead of 9.

Master

- All Expert changes apply.
- In Master mode, the Defiled Amalgamation gets an additional 60% increase in health raising it to 6144.
- The duration of the inflicted '[link Rasterized]' debuff lasts 8 seconds instead.
- The appendages instead block all incoming damage.
- The Defiled Amalgamation will only rejuvenate for 3 seconds after performing a Knockout attack instead of 9.
- Knockout attacks are more frequent.

Notes

-

Tips

- The Defiled Amalgamation will not spawn after smashing 3 [link Defiled Fissures] if the player reloads the world.
